---


---

<h1 id="基础语法："><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">基础语法：</span><span class="suffix"></span></h1>
<h2 id="一：第一个python程序"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">一：第一个python程序</span><span class="suffix"></span></h2>
<pre><code>print("Hello,World!")
</code></pre>
<h2 id="二：python3-简介"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">二：Python3 简介</span><span class="suffix"></span></h2>
<p>python是一个高层次的结合了解释性、编译性、互动性和面向对象的脚本语言。默认情况下，Python 3 源码文件以 <strong>UTF-8</strong> 编码，所有字符串都是 unicode 字符串。</p>
<h3 id="三：标识符"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">三：标识符</span><span class="suffix"></span></h3>
<ul>
<li>第一个字符必须是<strong>字母表</strong>中的字母或者<strong>下划线</strong>。也就是说用数字开头命名的标识符是非法的。</li>
<li>标识符的其他部分由字母、数字和下划线组成。</li>
<li>标识符对大小写敏感。例如： Hjt与HJt为不同的标识符。</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="四：保留字"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">四：保留字</span><span class="suffix"></span></h3>
<p>保留字即关键字，我们不能把它们用作任何标识符名称。Python 的标准库提供了一个 keyword 模块，可以输出当前版本的所有关键字：<br>
<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"><br>
输出结果为：<br>
[‘False’, ‘None’, ‘True’, ‘and’, ‘as’, ‘assert’, ‘break’, ‘class’, ‘continue’, ‘def’, ‘del’, ‘elif’, ‘else’, ‘except’, ‘finally’, ‘for’, ‘from’, ‘global’, ‘if’, ‘import’, ‘in’, ‘is’, ‘lambda’, ‘nonlocal’, ‘not’, ‘or’, ‘pass’, ‘raise’, ‘return’, ‘try’, ‘while’, ‘with’, ‘yield’]<br>
也就是说，不能使用False等来作为我们自己设定的标识符</p>
<h3 id="五：行与缩进"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">五：行与缩进</span><span class="suffix"></span></h3>
<p>python最具特色的就是使用缩进来表示代码块，不需要使用大括号 {}（C++中代码块的表示方式） 。</p>
<p>缩进的空格数是可变的，但是同一个代码块的语句必须包含相同的缩进空格数。</p>
<h3 id="六：多行语句"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">六：多行语句</span><span class="suffix"></span></h3>
<p>Python中通常是一行写完一条语句，但如果语句很长，可以使用反斜杠*\* 来实现多行语句，例如：</p>
<p><img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"><br>
这样使用反斜杠的形式将一行过长的代码分为多行的形式主要是提升阅读代码的心情。如果直接使用回车将代码进行换行会出现什么错误呢？</p>
<p>代码会报语法错误，这是为什么呢？</p>
<p>因为上文提到过行与缩进，Python对于行与缩进的要求非常严格，一个缩进代表的是一个代码块，那么如何不适用反斜杠并且不报错呢？</p>
<p><strong>使用括号</strong>，例如：<br>
<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"><br>
<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"><br>
可以看到代码成功运行。</p>
<p>行与缩进是Python区别于其他编程语言的<strong>显著特点</strong>，在编程过程中一定要多多注意。</p>
<h3 id="七：数字类型"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">七：数字类型</span><span class="suffix"></span></h3>
<p>Python中数字由四种类型组成：</p>
<ul>
<li>整数 （int）如1，只有一种证书类型int ，表示为长整型，表示数字范围<strong>没有限制</strong>。这是python非常恐怖的特征。（C++中的int类型能够表示的数字范围只有-2147483648到2147483647（32位系统））。这一特征为我们带来了便利（不用考虑数字范围，一个int代表所有整数），但是也埋下了隐患：如果设定为一个无限大的数，那么Python在解释代码时不会报错，极易耗空系统资源，导致死机）</li>
<li>布尔型（bool） True，False。（true，false不是布尔型，为什么呢？前文提到，标识符区别大小写）</li>
<li>浮点数（float），如，1.23、3E-2（科学计数法，代表3x10<sup>-2</sup>）。</li>
<li>复数（complex），如1+2j</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="八：字符串"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">八：字符串</span><span class="suffix"></span></h3>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Python 中单引号 ’ 和双引号 " 使用完全相同。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>使用三引号(’’’ 或 “”")可以指定一个多行字符串。例如<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"><img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>转义符 \。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>反斜杠可以用来转义，使用 r 可以让反斜杠不发生转义。 如 <strong>r"this is a line with \n"</strong> 则 \n 会显示，并不是换行。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>按字面意义级联字符串，如 <strong>"this " "is " “string”</strong> 会被自动转换为 <strong>this is string</strong>。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>字符串可以用 + 运算符连接在一起，用 * 运算符重复。例如：<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"><img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,">可以看到效果是一样的，那么这个加号的作用是什么呢？ 答：<strong>为了便于处理一句话中多种类型的输出</strong>。例如：<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Python 中的字符串有两种索引方式，从左往右以 0 开始，从右往左以 -1 开始。<br>
这个特性非常重要且使用，为什么呢？比如，在一个你不知道长度的字符串中，让你找最后一个字符是什么。在C++中，你需要这样 <code>c=s[s.length()-1]</code> 获取最后一位。而在python中，你只需要<code>c=s[-1]</code>即可。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Python 中的字符串不能改变。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Python 没有单独的字符类型，一个字符就是长度为 1 的字符串。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>字符串切片 str[start:end]，其中 start（包含）是切片开始的索引，end（不包含）是切片结束的索引。一般这种称为<strong>左闭右开</strong>区间。例如：<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"><br>
这里的start=0，end=-2，也就是说从字符串total的第0位-&gt;M（包含）到倒数第二位-&gt;d（不包含）。结果如下：<br>
<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>字符串的切片可以加上步长参数 step，语法格式如下：str[start🔚step]<br>
这里的步长step指的是从start位置开始（包含start）往右每走step步便截取一个字符，直到end位置。例如：<br>
<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"><br>
这里的start为0，end为-2，step为2。从M开始，每走两步便取一个字符，第一个截取字符为‘ ’（空格），第二个截取字符为a，。。。，最后一个截取字符为o。<br>
<img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="九：布尔类型"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">九：布尔类型</span><span class="suffix"></span></h3>
<p>在Python 3中，布尔类型（Boolean Type）是一种基本的数据类型，用于表示真（True）或假（False）的值。布尔类型在逻辑运算、条件判断和控制流程中起着重要作用。以下是关于Python 3中布尔类型的一些关键知识点：</p>
<h4 id="1.-布尔值"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">1. 布尔值</span><span class="suffix"></span></h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>True</strong>：表示真值。</li>
<li><strong>False</strong>：表示假值。</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="2.-布尔运算"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">2. 布尔运算</span><span class="suffix"></span></h4>
<p>Python支持以下布尔运算：</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>与（and）</strong>：两个操作数都为True时，结果为True。</li>
<li><strong>或（or）</strong>：两个操作数中只要有一个为True，结果为True。</li>
<li><strong>非（not）</strong>：取反操作，如果操作数为True，结果为False；如果操作数为False，结果为True。</li>
</ul>
<p>示例：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">a <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token boolean">True</span>
b <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token boolean">False</span>

<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a <span class="token operator">and</span> b<span class="token punctuation">)</span>  <span class="token comment"># 输出: False</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a <span class="token operator">or</span> b<span class="token punctuation">)</span>   <span class="token comment"># 输出: True</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token operator">not</span> a<span class="token punctuation">)</span>    <span class="token comment"># 输出: False</span>
</code></pre>
<h4 id="3.-布尔值的比较"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">3. 布尔值的比较</span><span class="suffix"></span></h4>
<p>布尔值可以与其他布尔值进行比较：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">a <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token boolean">True</span>
b <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token boolean">False</span>

<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a <span class="token operator">==</span> b<span class="token punctuation">)</span>  <span class="token comment"># 输出: False</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a <span class="token operator">!=</span> b<span class="token punctuation">)</span>  <span class="token comment"># 输出: True</span>
</code></pre>
<h4 id="4.-布尔值的类型"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">4. 布尔值的类型</span><span class="suffix"></span></h4>
<p>布尔值是<code>bool</code>类型的实例，而<code>bool</code>类型是<code>int</code>类型的子类。因此，布尔值可以与整数进行隐式转换：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">isinstance</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token boolean">True</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>  <span class="token comment"># 输出: True</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token boolean">True</span> <span class="token operator">+</span> <span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>               <span class="token comment"># 输出: 2</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token boolean">False</span> <span class="token operator">*</span> <span class="token number">5</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>              <span class="token comment"># 输出: 0</span>
</code></pre>
<h4 id="5.-布尔值的转换"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">5. 布尔值的转换</span><span class="suffix"></span></h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>布尔值转换为整数</strong>：True转换为1，False转换为0。</li>
<li><strong>整数转换为布尔值</strong>：非零整数转换为True，零转换为False。</li>
<li><strong>其他类型转换为布尔值</strong>：空字符串、空列表、空字典、空集合等转换为False，非空对象转换为True。</li>
</ul>
<p>示例：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token boolean">True</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>    <span class="token comment"># 输出: 1</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token boolean">False</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>   <span class="token comment"># 输出: 0</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">bool</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>      <span class="token comment"># 输出: True</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">bool</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>      <span class="token comment"># 输出: False</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">bool</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">""</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>     <span class="token comment"># 输出: False</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">bool</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"abc"</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>  <span class="token comment"># 输出: True</span>
</code></pre>
<h4 id="6.-条件表达式"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">6. 条件表达式</span><span class="suffix"></span></h4>
<p>布尔值常用于条件表达式中，控制程序的执行流程：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">a <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">10</span>
b <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">20</span>

<span class="token keyword">if</span> a <span class="token operator">&lt;</span> b<span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"a is less than b"</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">else</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"a is not less than b"</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<h4 id="7.-布尔上下文"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">7. 布尔上下文</span><span class="suffix"></span></h4>
<p>在布尔上下文中（如<code>if</code>语句、<code>while</code>循环、条件表达式等），Python会自动将其他类型的值转换为布尔值：<br>
在布尔上下文中（如<code>if</code>语句、<code>while</code>循环、条件表达式等），Python会自动将其他类型的值转换为布尔值：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">a <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>
<span class="token keyword">if</span> <span class="token operator">not</span> a<span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"a is empty"</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>

b <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token string">"Hello"</span>
<span class="token keyword">if</span> b<span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"b is not empty"</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<h3 id="十：列表、元组、字典、集合"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">十：列表、元组、字典、集合</span><span class="suffix"></span></h3>
<p>在Python 3中，列表（List）、元组（Tuple）、字典（Dictionary）和集合（Set）是四种常用的数据结构，每种数据结构都有其特定的用途和特性。以下是关于这些数据结构的一些关键知识点：</p>
<h4 id="1：列表（list）"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">1：列表（list）</span><span class="suffix"></span></h4>
<p>列表是一种<strong>有序</strong>的<strong>可变</strong>集合，可以包含<strong>任意类型</strong>的元素。列表用方括号 <code>[]</code> 表示。<br>
<strong>创建列表</strong>：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">my_list <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token string">'a'</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token string">'b'</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token string">'c'</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>
</code></pre>
<p><strong>访问元素</strong>：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>my_list<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>  <span class="token comment"># 输出: 1</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>my_list<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token comment"># 输出: 'c'</span>
</code></pre>
<p><strong>切片</strong>：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>my_list<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>  <span class="token comment"># 输出: [2, 3]</span>
</code></pre>
<p><strong>修改元素</strong>：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">my_list<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span> <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">10</span>
</code></pre>
<p><strong>添加元素</strong>：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">my_list <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token number">4</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token number">5</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>  
my_list<span class="token punctuation">.</span>extend<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">6</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token number">7</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token number">8</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token number">9</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>  
  
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>my_list<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<p><img alt="输入图片说明" src="data:image/png;base64,"><br>
<strong>删除元素</strong>：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">my_list<span class="token punctuation">.</span>remove<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token comment"># 移除数字2，而不是第二位的元素</span>
<span class="token keyword">del</span> my_list<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>
</code></pre>
<p><strong>常用方法</strong>：</p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">my_list<span class="token punctuation">.</span>sort<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> 	<span class="token comment">#排序</span>
my_list<span class="token punctuation">.</span>reverse<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token comment">#转置</span>
<span class="token builtin">len</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>my_list<span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token comment"># 获取长度</span>
</code></pre>
<h4 id="2.元组（tuple）"><span class="prefix"></span><span class="content">2.元组（Tuple）</span><span class="suffix"></span></h4>
<ol start="2">
<li>
<p><strong>运算符</strong>：</p>
<ul>
<li>算术运算符</li>
<li>比较运算符</li>
<li>逻辑运算符</li>
<li>赋值运算符</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>控制结构</strong>：</p>
<ul>
<li>条件语句（<code>if</code>，<code>else</code>，<code>elif</code>）</li>
<li>循环（<code>for</code>，<code>while</code>）</li>
<li>循环控制（<code>break</code>，<code>continue</code>，<code>pass</code>）</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>函数</strong>：</p>
<ul>
<li>定义和调用函数</li>
<li>参数和返回值</li>
<li>匿名函数（<code>lambda</code>）</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>输入和输出</strong>：</p>
<ul>
<li>控制台输入输出（<code>input</code>，<code>print</code>）</li>
<li>文件读写</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
